Class MusicManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzdiscord.music.MusicManager

  • public class MusicManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Adds music functionalities and commands to the bot.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • playAudio

        public void playAudio(java.lang.String message,
                      net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageChannel channel,
                      boolean startPlaying)
        Tells the bot to play a song from a Discord command with a YouTube URL.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that contains the song URL.
        channel - The channel to write the response.
        startPlaying - If the bot should instantly skip to this song.

      • skipAudio

      • playSong

        private void playSong(java.lang.String identifier,
                      net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageChannel messageChannel,
                      boolean startPlaying)
        Tells the bot to play a song.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier that a specific source manager should be able to find the track with.
        messageChannel - The channel to write the response.
        startPlaying - If the bot should instantly skip to this song.
